column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mako says : " So , how was the big premiere ? "
#Text=Bolin says : " I saved the president , in real life ! "
#Text=Mako says : " Wait , wh - what ? "
#Text=Bolin says : " You were right about Varrick .
#Text=" Bolin says : " But it did n't work , because of you , and because of me .
#Text=Let 's just say we both did good .
#Text=Beifong says you 're free to go .
#Text=Sorry for ever doubting you , Mako .
#Text=" Mako says : " Do n't worry about it bro .
#Text=" Lin Beifong says : " Nice job , Mako .
#Text=You 're going to make a great detective .
#Text=" Gang says : " But chief , there are n't any detective openings right now .
#Text=" Lin Beifong says : " Actually we have two openings .
#Text=" Korra says : " Mako , I 've missed you so much .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh yeah , did I forget to tell you ?
#Text=Korra 's back .
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra ... hey , I missed you , too .
#Text=So you 're not still mad at me ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Why would I be mad ?
#Text=" Mako says : " We had that fight before you left , remember ?
#Text=" Korra says : " No , not really .
#Text=I got attacked by a dark spirit and I lost my memory for a little while .
#Text=Maybe it has n't all come back yet .
#Text=Was it a bad fight ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Uh ... No .
#Text=No , it was n't that bad .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Korra , we do n't have much time .
#Text=We need to figure out how to deal with Unalaq .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I think I know just the man to talk to .
#Text="
